Title


Description


Categories


Date






Conversational SQL Assistant with LLM Agents  [Langchain]


Created an LLM agent able to chat with sql databases utilizing postgres and Langchain.  A synthetic dataset was created to mimic real world e-commerce datasets.   Chatbot is able to read thorugh purchase data, article information, log data to answer questions and output csv files for the user to utilize.  [Langchain, Langgraph, Postgres, Streamlit, OpenAI, Docker] 


AI Agents


Dec 13, 2024




Visa Guidance RAG Chatbot for International Students  [Langchain]


Utilizing chromadb and langchian to build a chatbot using retrieval augmented generation to answer questions related to visas for international students  where official information is retrieved from US Citizenship and Immigration Services.  [Langchain, LangGraph, Chromadb, Gradio, OpenAI, Docker] 


AI Agents


Dec 13, 2024




AI Travel Guide Chatbot [Langchain]


Build a travel guide chatbot using two approaches: 1. Custom Solution: Manually chain LLMs, fine-tuned models, and tool-calling for a tailored experience. 2. Modern Framework: Leverage LangChain for streamlined tool-calling and scalability.  [Langchain, Ollama, unsloth, finetune, LoRa, streamlit, OpenAI, HuggingFace] 


AI Agents


Dec 13, 2024




CrisisFacts: Disaster Response Data Platform  [Information Retrieval]


A submission for CrisisFACTS: an open data challenge for state-of-the-art temporal summarization technologies to support disaster-response managers’ use of online data sources during crisis events. Implemented a backend database with mongodb, self-made ackage to process data, and a frontend for better user experience.  [Docker, React js, MongoDB, Flask API, Docker, Information Retrieval] 


Information Retrieval


Oct 1, 2024




Patterns in Advice-Seeking and Reaction Sentiment Prediction on Reddit  [AWS Sagemaker]


A project examining Reddit data alongside external sources, such as “Dear Abby” newspaper columns, to uncover patterns in advice-seeking behavior and the nature of responses. The analysis provides insights into how people seek guidance and how others react, both positively and negatively. Additionally, a random forest algorithm predicts the sentiment of reactions, offering a deeper understanding of interpersonal dynamics in advice exchanges.  [AWS, Sagemaker, SparkNLP, RandomForest, TopicModeling] 


Visualization, Modeling


Aug 12, 2024




Climate Predictions and Preservation Insights for Natural Bridges National Monument


Building a CNN neural network framework from scratch with pytorch to predict the price of products sold on amazon through thumbnail images.  Further conducting saliency analysis and class activation map analysis to find what features the model looks at to predict price.  [Pytorch] 


Visualization


May 12, 2024




Product Price Prediction from Images with CNN Framework


To support environmental preservation efforts, this project predicts future temperature, precipitation, and other key features using historical data from Natural Bridges National Monument in Utah. Through detailed analysis, correlations between variables were identified using advanced visualizations and dimensionality reduction techniques. By leveraging t-SNE, the project highlights significant relationships between features and forecasts future environmental conditions, offering actionable insights for preserving this iconic landmark.  [Pytorch] 


Deep Learning


May 12, 2024




Building a Neural Network from Scratch with Numpy


Build a simple neural network entirely from scratch to develop a clear and detailed understanding of how backpropagation works. By implementing the process step by step, you’ll gain insights into the underlying mechanics of gradient computation, weight updates, and how the network learns from data.  [Numpy] 


DeepLearning


May 12, 2024




Toxic Comment Detection with LSTM Networks


Developed a model to classify toxic comments from social media platforms using an LSTM-based neural network implemented with Keras, leveraging deep learning to analyze and detect harmful content.  [Keras, LSTM] 


DeepLearning


Jan 1, 2024




Match Prediction with Poisson Distribution


Designed a predictive model for Premier League football match outcomes, leveraging historical scores and home/away dynamics. The model estimates the likelihood of each team scoring a specific number of goals and combines these probabilities to forecast match results, determining wins, losses, or draws. The predictions achieved an 87% alignment with betting site forecasts and demonstrated a 63% accuracy against actual match results.  [scipy, sklearn, matplotlib, seaborn, pandas, numpy] 


Statistical Modeling


Jan 1, 2024

title: JaeHo Bahng
text:
SQL AI Agent for e-Commerce Sales Analysis [Link] :
Developed an LLM-powered agent capable of interacting with SQL databases using PostgreSQL and LangChain. Designed a synthetic dataset to emulate real-world e-commerce scenarios. The chatbot seamlessly processes purchase data, product details, and log information, enabling it to answer queries and generate CSV outputs for user convenience.
[Langchain, Langgraph, Postgres, Streamlit, OpenAI]
RAG AI Agent for Navigating VISA Regulations [Link] :
Visa regulations are a significant concern for international students navigating job searches in the United States. This chatbot leverages a RAG pipeline with ChromaDB to provide accurate answers to your questions, directly referencing official government documents and pinpointing the exact sections relevant to your query.
[Langchain, Langgraph, ChromaDB, Gradio, OpenAI]

title: JaeHo Bahng
text:
More About Me
Growing up as a third-culture kid, I moved every 2–3 years, living in Hong Kong, Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, China, and Bangladesh. Attending international schools shaped my bilingual proficiency in English and Korean and taught me to embrace diversity with a global perspective. After 14 years abroad, I returned to Korea, earning a degree in economics from Sogang University. I then worked as a data analyst at an online fashion retail platform for four years. Currently, I’m pursuing a master’s in Data Science and Analytics at Georgetown University while working as a data analyst at Tractor Supply Company.
